example.name: autogen1
example.text: `` I am the hope and the dream , the redemption of cowards , '' he says in one of many interior monologues .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: a tragicomic monologue by an idealistic , not unheroic , though sadly self-deceived English butler in his sixties
example.arg: by an idealistic , not unheroic , though sadly self-deceived English butler in his sixties
